edu.washington.ext

Class InvoiceItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.washington.ext.InvoiceItem

  • public final class InvoiceItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines an edu.washington.ext.InvoiceItem object, which sets a quantity of Items to purchase, as well as a discount to be applied to the edu.washington.ext.InvoiceItem. Author: Alex Harris Version: 3/16/14.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InvoiceItem(Item item, int quantity)
      Constructs an edu.washington.ext.InvoiceItem.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getDiscount()
      Gets the discount applied to this specific edu.washington.ext.Item purchase.
      java.lang.String getItemDescription()
      Gets the item description.
      double getNetCost()
      Gets the net cost of this item purchase, which is the Total Cost less the discounted amount.
      int getQuantity()
      Gets the quantity being purchased.
      double getTotalDiscount()
      Gets the total discount that will be applied to this purchased item, which is the Total Value time the Discount
      double getTotalValue()
      Gets the total value of the purchase, which is the original price x quantity being purchased.
      void setDiscount(double discount)
      Sets the discount for this edu.washington.ext.InvoiceItem.
      void setQuantity(int quantity)
      Sets the quantity of the item that is being purchased.
